JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Experienced Vietnamese Cuisine Chef for District Tonkin
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Join Our Team at District Tonkin - Vietnamese Cuisine Chefs Wanted
Location: Copenhagen

District Tonkin is looking for skilled, passionate chefs specializing in Vietnamese cuisine to join our dynamic kitchen team at our locations in Copenhagen. We are seeking individuals with strong culinary skills, a commitment to excellence, and a passion for delivering an exceptional dining experience.

About Us
At District Tonkin, we take great pride in providing our guests with an immersive Vietnamese dining experience. Our team is composed of dedicated professionals who work collaboratively to deliver top-notch service and quality, with a focus on authentic flavors and innovative dishes.

What We’re Looking For
We are seeking motivated, responsible, and skilled chefs with a minimum of 3 years of experience working in the kitchen, preferably in Vietnamese or Asian cuisine. You’ll be a key player in ensuring that each dish meets our high standards, and you will collaborate closely with our Head Chef to continually elevate the menu and kitchen operations.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Prepare and cook authentic Vietnamese dishes with precision and passion
  • Ensure the highest level of food quality and presentation
  • Work closely with the Head Chef to execute menu items and innovate new offerings
  • Maintain a clean, organized, and efficient kitchen
  • Contribute to a positive, cooperative team environment

Requirements:

  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in the restaurant industry, with a focus on kitchen operations
  • Strong knowledge and passion for Vietnamese cuisine
  • A commitment to maintaining high standards of quality and service
  • Motivated, responsible, and capable of working both independently and in a team
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment while maintaining attention to detail

Why Join Us?

  • Become part of a talented and supportive team
  • Opportunity to work in a creative and dynamic environment
  • Contribute to a growing restaurant with a reputation for quality and authenticity
  • Competitive salary and benefits

If you're ready to bring your passion for Vietnamese cuisine to District Tonkin and grow with us, we’d love to hear from you!
